gil.common
Class Parameters

java.lang.Object
  gil.common.Parameters

public class Parameters
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a wrapper around a key-value set of parameters, supplying getters that validates parameters depending on their data type.

          Constructs a parameter object with no parameters.
